    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet OperationSchedule_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:OperationSchedule_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<OperationSchedule additionalOperationInfoCode="2" daysOfWeek="Monday Tuesday Wednesday" frequency="Example String Value" text="Example String Value" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <DateTimeSpanWindowsDetail>
        <TimeSpan end="2016-08-28T04:32:52Z" start="2016-08-22T19:32:52Z"/>
        <StartWindow end="2016-08-28T04:32:52Z" start="2016-08-22T19:32:52Z"/>
        <EndWindow end="2016-08-28T04:32:52Z" start="2016-08-22T19:32:52Z"/>
        <Duration>PT1004199059S</Duration>
        <DurationUnit>SUN</DurationUnit>
    </DateTimeSpanWindowsDetail>
</OperationSchedule>

      Example JSON

      {
  "OperationSchedule" : {
    "daysOfWeek" : [ "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday" ],
    "additionalOperationInfoCode" : "2",
    "frequency" : "Example String Value",
    "text" : "Example String Value",
    "DateTimeSpanWindows" : {
      "@type" : "DateTimeSpanWindowsDetail",
      "TimeSpan" : {
        "value" : null,
        "start" : "2016-08-22T19:32:52Z",
        "end" : "2016-08-28T04:32:52Z"
      },
      "StartWindow" : {
        "value" : null,
        "start" : "2016-08-22T19:32:52Z",
        "end" : "2016-08-28T04:32:52Z"
      },
      "EndWindow" : {
        "value" : null,
        "start" : "2016-08-22T19:32:52Z",
        "end" : "2016-08-28T04:32:52Z"
      },
      "Duration" : [ "PT1004199059S" ],
      "DurationUnit" : {
        "value" : "SUN"
      }
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        DateTimeSpanWindows
        The date span applicable to the operation.
        Details
        Type DateTimeSpanWindows
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        daysOfWeek
        The day(s) of week to which the operation time applies.
        Details
        Type DayOfOperation
        Example Value Monday Tuesday Wednesday
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        additionalOperationInfoCode
        Used to provide additional information regarding operation times (e.g., after hours operations, restricted times). Refer to OpenTravel Code List Additional Operation Info (OPR).
        Details
        Type OTA_Code
        Example Value 2
        Required false
        Pattern [0-9A-Z]{1,4}(\.[A-Z]{3}(\.X){0,1}){0,1}
        Max Occurrences 1
        frequency
        The frequency with which this operation occurs (e.g., 'on the hour', 'on the half hour').
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        text
        Textual information for this period of operation.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
